ProteinName	Pantetheine hydrolase VNN2 (EC 3.5.1.92) (Glycosylphosphatidyl inositol-anchored protein GPI-80) (Protein FOAP-4) (Vascular non-inflammatory molecule 2) (Vanin-2)
GeneName	VNN2
Length	467
Function	Amidohydrolase that hydrolyzes specifically one of the carboamide linkages in D-pantetheine thus recycling pantothenic acid (vitamin B5) and releasing cysteamine (PubMed:11491533). Involved in the thymus homing of bone marrow cells. May regulate beta-2 integrin-mediated cell adhesion, migration and motility of neutrophil.
